Thanks for catching this!

1. Can you please file a [JIRA issue](https://beam.apache.org/contribute/contribution-guide/#jira-issue-tracker) in the `sdk-java-core` component and update the Pull Request title with the issue number? That way we can track this issue publicly and it will show in the release notes.

2. I will put a few test suggestions, but you did a great start!
Thanks @dhalperi  and @xumingming !

`WINDOW` in my previous comment refers to HOP/TUMBLE/SESSION windows added in BEAM-2006. 

With that window applied, I suppose the output of `Top` would be top N records for each window. For unbounded data that may be fair enough, but not sure when it's applied on a bounded source.

R: @xumingming 
CC: @davorbonaci @jbonofre

Coverage decreased (-0.007%) to 70.218% when pulling **5dec09f884b5a085bd528f6881d8334930bc0a89 on wtanaka:BEAM-2293** into **9a43da74a9005507acdc80524edc634c8318674d on apache:master**.
Hi @kennknowles, I refined the code, please take a look at it.

According to the result we discussed offline due to the semantic constraints of `WINDOW`s in SQL:

> WINDOW in SQL is actually `BEAM WINDOW` + `BEAM GroupBy`

it makes `ORDER BY` does not make much sense for WINDOWS other than GlobalWindow. So our `ORDER BY` will only support GlobalWindow, and will throw UnsupportedException is used with other window. And will update javadoc to describe this.
Seems no easy way to check whether there is a WINDOW applied in the same level(WINDOW can be in current query, or nested query), will not throw the exception for now.

This doesn't meet the bar at this stage, right? It seems to affect PubsubIO only, and only for certain types of messages.

Without this change, PubsubIO.readAvros() is unusable (it was untested too - my bad) because most classes used with AvroIO won't be protobufs. It might be ok - users have the workaround of manually doing what it does. But on the other hand this change is fully safe. Your call, I'm fine either way.
Understood. I say -1, unless there are other reasons why the RC must be rebuilt. At that point, it will change to +1.
Run Seed Job
